Module: html_report_content_line¶

This module contains functionality to create the QA overview page which gives access to the line QA products.

Reference¶

report.html_report_content_line.write_obs_content_line(html_code, qa_report_obs_path, page_type)[source]¶

Function to create the html page for line

Args:
html_code (str): HTML code with header and title qa_report_obs_path (str): Path to the report directory page_type (str): The type of report page
Return:
html_code (str): Body of HTML code for this page
